main-page.first-block-description: Tokens, generally speaking, are non-mineable digital units of value that exist as registry entries in blockchains. Tokens come in many different forms – they can be used as currencies for specific ecosystems or encode unique data. Additionally, some tokens might be redeemable for off-chain assets (i.e., gold, property, stocks).
main-page.second-block-description: The ERC-20 introduces a standard for Fungible Tokens, in other words, they have a property that makes each Token be exactly the same (in type and value) as another Token. For example, an ERC-20 Token acts just like the ETH, meaning that 1 Token is and will always be equal to all the other Tokens.
main-page.third-block-description: A Non-Fungible Token (NFT) is used to identify something or someone in a unique way. This type of Token is perfect to be used on platforms that offer collectible items, access keys, lottery tickets, numbered seats for concerts and sports matches, etc. This special type of Token has amazing possibilities so it deserves a proper Standard, the ERC-721 came to solve that!
main-page.fourth-block-description: Ukrainian R&D blockchain center consisting of developers, cryptographers, business analysts and architects specialized on launching custom blockchain platforms turn-key, in sum around 100 people in-house. On market since 2014.
main-page.people-description: The team consists of researchers, developers, analysts. Main activities are creation of innovative products and architectures, education events and conferences. The goal of Distributed Lab is to create financial internet that uses open, uniform protocol that facilitates trade and value transfer.

post-item-page-checkout.decrease-percent-tooltip: The price of the product is reduced by a specified amount after each purchase.

post-item-page-checkout.minimal-price-tooltip: The minimum price of the product, can not be lower than the specified value
post-item-page-checkout.reward-tooltip: The specified number of tokens will be transferred to the buyer's address after the purchase
post-item-page-checkout.distribution-tooltip: The specified number of tokens will be distributed among all participants of farming

default.title: Deploy
default.subtitle: Token
default.description: You are going to deploy some token.
default.payment-info: Select the token you want to pay with

erc721-common.description: Deploy your product on chain. The first time you will need to make two transactions. The first will allow us to take payment for the product, the second will perform the deployment of the smart contract in the network. Afterwards, only one transaction will be necessary.
erc721-common.deploy-success-message: Congratulations! You’ve just deployed your contract for Fungible Tokens!

erc20-common.description: Deploy your product on chain. The first time you will need to make two transactions. The first will allow us to take payment for the product, the second will perform the deployment of the smart contract in the network. Afterwards, only one transaction will be necessary.
erc20-common.cap-info: Total supply will be limited to the number of tokens entered
erc20-common.deploy-success-message: Congratulations! You’ve just deployed your contract for Non Fungible Tokens!

erc20-common.title: Editing
erc20-common.description: Editing your token smart contract parameters on chain. After each edition transaction is initiated. After transaction is added to the blockchain new parameters take effect.

erc721-common.description: Editing your token smart contract parameters on chain. After each edition transaction is initiated. After transaction is added to the blockchain new parameters take effect.
